page.title: 04A FENCING CONTRACTOR
page.content: Mr Bradbury is a{fencing contractor. Brought up in{Ross,}he has been interested in the{countryside}all his life. He{farmed}for a while, then started his{fencing business 15 years ago. He has worked in{New Zealand}and {Italy,}due to{satisfied customers recommending him, and a lot in{hills and{forests.}He{judges fencing {competitions for Young Farmers,and has {no wish to expand -"Keep small but {good." }He likes to see hedges and trees, and thinks{hedges will start to {increase. }He disapproves of{"book {experts"}influencing changes in the countryside, and of the{EEC,}which means politicians making decisions for farmers. He{chooses his clients}- who all contact him - preferring those who {respect the countryside,}like private houses and the{National Trust,}and jobs were the work is pleasant.
